name: Luminous Pearl
skill: Recovers 1248/1488 HP to all allies. Targets receive 54/64% less DMG for a limited time.
ability: Restores HP to the ally with the lowest percentage of HP at the start of each wave.
Moderately increases all Anima team members' crit rate when this daemon is Team Leader.

additional_data.description: The spirit of a precious stone that accumulates light during the day and shines at night. They say this light is the source of a mysterious power and that absorbing it can make incredible things possible. Recently people have found clever ways to use this to protect against brutes, and other helpful things. This has her smiling a lot more than before. But people who know her former haughty personality have started making fun of her more, too.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ "Jewels and The Secret Workshop" Event: Get a First Half or Second Half Ranking of 2500 and above.
◦ "Jewels and The Secret Workshop" Event: Get a Total Ranking of 3000 and above.
additional_data.notes_and_trivia: ◦ Moderately increases the drop rate of Pyroxene Shards during the "Jewels and The Secret Workshop" event.

main: "I just wanna be useful to people. No matter how minor, I wanna help people somehow..."
skill: "Time for my powers of protection! I do this for everyone!"
summon: "I want to serve others by your side. That's why I lend you my help."
